items.name: Potion
items.description: Restores 20 HP.

items.name: Super Potion
items.description: Restores 60 HP.

items.name: Hyper Potion
items.description: Restores 120 HP.

items.name: Full Heal
items.description: Cures a Pokémon of any status condition.

items.name: Paralyze Heal
items.description: Cures a Pokémon of paralysis.

items.name: Burn Heal
items.description: Cures a Pokémon of a burn.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: Cures a Pokémon of poisoning.

items.name: Rare Candy
items.description: Raises a Pokémon's level by 1.

items.name: Revive
items.description: Revives a fainted Pokémon, restoring half its HP.

items.name: PP Heal
items.description: Restored all pp of a Pokémon.

items.name: Poke Ball
items.description: Catches wild Pokémon.

items.name: Great Ball
items.description: Catches wild Pokémon with 1.5x the rate of a Poké Ball.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.description: Catches wild Pokémon with 2x the rate of a Poké Ball

items.name: Net Ball
items.description: Catches Water- and Bug-type Pokémon with 3.5x the rate of a standard Poké Ball.

items.name: Heal Ball
items.description: Catches wild Pokémon and fully heals them.
